feature.label: SMeshStudio eclipse extensions
feature.description: This feature allows easy creation of mBed,Arduino,Contiki projects in an Eclipse environment. The main features are a new wizard a import library wizard a button to build the project a button to upload to the arduino board a project property page allowing to change the arduino board type and the port the mbed
